text:
e guidelines
The ultimate goal of these guidelines is to improve the quality of postnatal care and health 
outcomes for mothers and newborns. Therefore the dissemination and implementation 
of these guidelines are crucial steps that should be undertaken by the international 
community and local health care services. 
Guidelines dissemination 
The recommendations in these guidelines will be disseminated through a broad network 
of international partners, including WHO country and regional offices
